botan.cert.cvc.cvc_ado

EAC11 CVC ADO

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class EAC11ADOImpl: botan.cert.cvc.eac_obj.EAC11obj!(EAC11ADOImpl).EAC11obj, botan.cert.cvc.signed_obj.SignedObject;
This class represents a TR03110 (EAC) v1.1 CVC ADO request

this(in string input);
Construct a CVC ADO request from a DER encoded CVC ADO request file.

Params:
string input the path to the DER encoded file

this(DataSource input);
Construct a CVC ADO request from a data source

Params:
DataSource input the data source

Vector!ubyte makeSigned(ALLOC)(ref PKSigner signer, auto ref const Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) tbs_bits, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a signed CVC ADO request from to be signed (TBS) data

Params:
PKSigner signer the signer used to sign the CVC ADO request
Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) tbs_bits the TBS data to sign
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

const const(ASN1Car) getCar();
Get the CAR of this CVC ADO request

Returns:
the CAR of this CVC ADO request

const const(EAC11Req) getRequest();
Get the CVC request contained in this object.

Returns:
the CVC request inside this CVC ADO request

const void encode(Pipe output, X509Encoding encoding);
Encode this object into a pipe. Only DER is supported.

Params:
Pipe output the pipe to encode this object into
X509Encoding encoding the encoding type to use, must be DER

const const(Vector!ubyte) tbsData();
Get the TBS data of this CVC ADO request.

Returns:
the TBS data

this(ref EAC11ADO other);
Construct a CVC ADO request from a copy of another ADO object

Params:
EAC11ADO other the other object

void opAssign(ref EAC11ADO other);
Replace this ADO request with references to another one

Params:
EAC11ADO other the other object
